title: George Washington Carver National Monument: Multimedia Presentations
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Multimedia Presentations              Multimedia Presentations      Â                      Struggle and Triumph: The Legacy of George Washington Carver This 28-minute film explores the life of the George Washington Carver. The film features Altorro Prince Black a the adult George Washington Carver and Tyler Black as the young Carver, narration by Sheryl Lee Ralph, and music by Bobby Horton.   Duration:28 minutes, 18 seconds
